question: Drug which is absolutely contraindicated in pregnancy is:
exp: Ans. (b) Chloramphenicol. Ref KD Tripathi 6th Ed. 1716 & 909. CHLORAMPHENICOL* It is a broad-spectrum antibiotic, active against nearly the same range of organisms (gram-positive and negative bacteria, rickettsiae, mycoplasma) as tetracyclines. Adverse Efects* Bone marrow depression* Hypersensitivity reactions* Grey baby syndrome. Choice of drugs for common problems during pregnancy. Drug class (condition). Unsafe drugs. Safer alternative.
